paper_abstract: Lexvo.org brings information about languages, words, and other linguistic entities to the Web of Linked Data. It defines URIs for terms, languages, scripts, and characters, which are not only highly interconnected but also linked to a variety of resources on the Web. Additionally, new datasets are being published to contribute to the emerging Linked Data Cloud of Language-Related information.
paper_title: Lexvo.org: Language-related information for the Linguistic Linked Data cloud
